subject: Re: First Good RShack Response
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Yeah, they do that a lot.  They call me "urkel" all the time and call 
frank "Purple".  I even heard one of kristin's files say "Nitsirk", 
which is her name backwards.  It's almost like they read these yahoo 
groups too.  They also probably do that to get our attention, 
shouting out a nickname would catch most people off guard and make 
them listen more.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "David" <cycron@...> wrote:
>
> Ok i posted my first really good RShack response. We where on an 
> investigation of the seattle underground, I ask the question can 
you 
> tell us your name and instead of saying theres the answer me back 
with 
> Vinnie hello, Now the thing everyone should know is when im not at 
work 
> just about everyone i know calls me Vinnie it was a nick that i got 
> back about 15+ years ago in high school. I was in shock when i hurd 
it. 
> Take a listen and let me know what you think. Youll find it in the 
> APART box files file.
> 
> Dave (vinnie) Vacknitz
> www.apartofwa.com
>
